tp:treatment-sec.p:
Campanularia hincksii
is a circumglobal species, recorded in the eastern Atlantic from Iceland to South Africa ( Peña Cantero & García Carrascosa 2002 ). Its bathymetric distribution extends from the tidal level to a depth of 1200 m ( Peña Cantero & García Carrascosa 2002 ; Leloup 1940 ).
